data.eml:eml: A new species of arboreal microteiid lizard of the genus Euspondylus (Gymnophtalmidae: Cercosaurinae) from the Andean slopes of central Peru with comments on Peruvian Euspondylus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chávez, Germán, Catenazzi, Alessandro, Venegas, Pablo J. (2017): A new species of arboreal microteiid lizard of the genus Euspondylus (Gymnophtalmidae: Cercosaurinae) from the Andean slopes of central Peru with comments on Peruvian Euspondylus. Zootaxa 4350 (2): 301-316, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4350.2.6
